root.long: BeeCount Cloud microservice management tool, used to start, stop and monitor various microservices.
root.help.long: Show help information for the specified command.
start.short: Start specified service or all services
start.long: Start specified microservice or all microservices. Service name is optional, if not specified, all services will be started.
start.example:
BeeCount-Cloud start          # Start all services
  BeeCount-Cloud start gateway    # Start gateway service
  BeeCount-Cloud start --all      # Start all services
  BeeCount-Cloud start --background # Start all services in background
  BeeCount-Cloud start gateway --background # Start gateway service in background
stop.short: Stop specified service or all services
stop.long: Stop specified microservice or all microservices. Service name is optional, if not specified, all services will be stopped. High-risk operation, requires confirmation.
stop.example:
BeeCount-Cloud stop          # Stop all services (requires confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud stop gateway    # Stop gateway service (requires confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud stop --all      # Stop all services (requires confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud stop --force    # Force stop all services (skip confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud stop gateway --force # Force stop gateway service (skip confirmation)
restart.short: Restart specified service or all services
restart.long: Restart specified microservice or all microservices. Service name is optional, if not specified, all services will be restarted. High-risk operation, requires confirmation.
restart.example:
BeeCount-Cloud restart          # Restart all services (requires confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud restart gateway    # Restart gateway service (requires confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud restart --all      # Restart all services (requires confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud restart --force    # Force restart all services (skip confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud restart gateway --force # Force restart gateway service (skip confirmation)
  BeeCount-Cloud restart --background # Restart all services in background
status.long: Check the running status of specified microservice or all microservices. Service name is optional, if not specified, status of all services will be checked.
status.example:
BeeCount-Cloud status          # Check status of all services
  BeeCount-Cloud status gateway    # Check status of gateway service
health.long: Check the health status of specified microservice or all microservices. Service name is optional, if not specified, health status of all services will be checked.
health.example:
BeeCount-Cloud health          # Check health status of all services
  BeeCount-Cloud health gateway    # Check health status of gateway service
completion.short: Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
